apps.title: Apps
apps.heroText: Check out the apps I've built over the years with Vue. Hope you enjoy exploring them!

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.heroText: Explore the creations I've built and the experiences I've gained over the years!

quizzes.title: Quizzes
quizzes.heroText: I've designed many quizzes and single-player games using Svelte. While most of them are geography-related, do check out some of the others as well!

blog.title: Blog
blog.heroText: Welcome to my blog, where I dive into my experiences and share insights on a range of topics.

games.title: Games
games.heroText: Challenge your friends to online multiplayer games I've built with React. Let's play!
